Title: Establishes an international division within the department of state to establish and maintain international sister state relationships
Summary: Establishes an international division within the department of state to establish and maintain international sister state relationships to facilitate and maintain the exchange of students and faculty.
LawCode: Amd ยง92, add ยง110, Exec L; amd ยง355, Ed L; add ยง226, Ec Dev L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, the education law and the economic development law, in relation to establishing an international division within the department of state
